About.title: About me
About.content: I'm Rafael, a junior software developer that enjoys solving problems and learning new things. I also enjoy wireframing, ui, ux, and design in general. Currently i'm looking for new challenges.I prefer projects based on JavaScript (React, TypeScript, NodeJS, etc.), but I am always open to new challenges that may involve other technologies.

EI.name: Bachelor in Informatics Engineering - Software Engineer

CTSP.name: Higher Technical Professional Course in Information Systems Technologies and Programming

ESAC.name: Technical Professional Course in Information Systems Technologies and Programming

BuildUpLabs.name: Build Up Labs
BuildUpLabs.description: I was integrated into the Tap My Back project team, where I collaborated with various members, developing agile work skills, coordination, and communication. My activities included improving the design, resolving bugs and implementing new features.

Cibersur.name: CiberSur
Cibersur.description: Development of a web application for predictive maintenance of factory equipment. The application went through several stages requirements gathering, implementing the visual and logical part of the application.

DAGI.name: Marine, Information Analysis and Management Department
DAGI.description: Participation in the development of a recruitment application in an ASP.NET environment with C# and WebForms.

100Limite.name: 100 Limite
100Limite.description: Development of Web pages (Landing pages) with WordPress.

COCARE.title: Co-Care | Co-created ICT solutions for Alzheimer s Informal Caregiving
COCARE.description: Participation in the Co Care project within multidisciplinary teams, focusing on the development of a prototype for a mobile application designed to support caregivers of individuals with Alzheimer's disease.

miniBlog.title: Mini-blog
miniBlog.description: A React project where I learned to work with components and events, exploring the use of hooks and implementing React Router.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: My personal portfolio showing my skills as a software developer.

ContactMe.errorName: Name must be at least 2 characters long
